titleStmt.title: A just and true remonstrance of His Majesties mines-royall in the principality of Wales, presented by Thomas Bushell Esquire, farmer of the said mines-royall, to His Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Bushell, Thomas, 1594-1674.
